title: Unrecognisable MAFS star Elizabeth Sobinoff shows off her slim new figure before eating chips
text:
Married At First Sight star Elizabeth Sobinoff has shown off her slim figure on Instagram as she continues to showcase her weight loss journey.

On Friday, Elizabeth stripped off into a ruby-coloured body suit with her legs crossed, showing off ample thigh gap while bent over towards the camera.

The Instagram star brandished a bottle of bronzer and had the edges of her body suit pulled up to compare her natural skin colour with the results of the lotion.

New look! Elizabeth Sobinoff (pictured) stripped off into a ruby-coloured body suit in a post shared to Instagram on Friday

The 27-year-old also revealed she had been enjoying a huge steak with a side of delicious chips on Thursday.

The jewellery store manager has continued to shock her followers with her new look after shedding 10 kilos following her appearance on the the reality show.

In a post on Sunday, Elizabeth star appeared unrecognisable as she showcased her slender frame in a black crop top.

Diet secret? The 27-year-old also revealed she had been enjoying a huge steak with a side of delicious chips on Thursday

Changes: The jewellery store manager has continued to shock her followers with her 10-kilo weight loss after her appearance on the the reality show. She showcased her incredibly trim frame in an Instagram post on Sunday

Her lean waistline was highlighted by figure-hugging high-waisted skirt.

She exuded positivity in her caption, writing: 'I hope everyone is feeling fine, if you are not, I hope your crown stops slipping soon.

'I genuinely mean this but yes I’m aware it is a photo of me posing with an inspirational quote. Take what you will from that but I hope you are all having a good one,' she added.

Chic: The reality TV star also shared a close up of her monochrome makeup look and the Louis Vuitton scarf tied around her head

In another post, Elizabeth shared a close up of her monochrome makeup look and the Louis Vuitton scarf tied around her head.

The blonde beauty accessorised with large hoop earrings and a series of colourful rings.

Elizabeth has recently faced backlash after debuting a plump pout in a glamorous on social media.
description: Married At First Sight star Elizabeth Sobinoff has shown off her slim figure on Instagram as she continues to showcase her weight loss journey.
authors: Tom Place For Daily Mail Australia
